H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H6795.def: = process by which an object moves down into something else

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H1543.def: = a round, deep dish or basin for the storage of liquids

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H3612.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jephunneh<SDBH:יְפֻנֶּה>}; {L:clan of Kenaz<SDBH:קְנִזִּי>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land

H836.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, slave of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5910.def: = town; ◄ located on the coast of the Mediterranean; territory of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}

H6721.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; presumably a personification of the city that played a prominent role in Canaanite culture and history

H392.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H7340.def: = central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3669.def: = descendant of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>} and inhabitant of the country named after them

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1053.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H3669.def: = descendant of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>} and inhabitant of the country named after them

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4522.def: = a class of people who are enlisted compulsorily to do work for others

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3905.def: = action by which someone presses oneself against another object

H1835.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

51.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H2974.def: = to be and/or behave like one with little insight, education or wisdom; ≈ pejorative (see the related term {L:אִוֶּלֶת<SDBH:אִוֶּלֶת>})

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H2776.def: exact meaning unsure: = contagious disease of the skin

H357.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>}, {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Kohath<SDBH:קְהָת>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H8169.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>}; ► during time of king {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>} under control of {L:Ben-Deker<SDBH:בֶּן־דֶּקֶר>}

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3513.def: = state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4522.def: = a class of people who are enlisted compulsorily to do work for others

H1366.def: = a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H4610.def: = terrestrial arachnid with pincers and a poisonous sting at the end of its jointed tail, which it can hold curved over the back; it grows to about 13 cm long; ≈  associated with harsh, inhospitable living conditions

H4605.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to
